attributes.action: Make Nicola Sturgeon Prime Minister of the UK & Ruth Davidson a Defence Minister
attributes.background: After the UK referendum on EU, country is in dire straits of a genuine leadership which shall bring the country (the UK) together including Scotland. We should work together to be a one country which should always be the United Kingdom of Britian. No Conservative & No Labour, they are untrustworthy.

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
